captions.caption: Directional growth anisotropy changes fold morphology relative to isotropic growth (delta GI=1.2515, delta curvature p90=-0.4493).
Spatial-hash collision handling reduces overlap-count outliers versus sampled collision checks (delta overlap count=15.0) while remaining within runtime budget.
Layered approximation improves GI and reduces skull penetration fraction on the reference setting (delta GI=0.0911, delta outside skull frac=-0.0062).
Deterministic baseline-vs-improved animation comparison from a shared source pipeline (delta GI=0.0911, delta disp p95=-0.0011).
